title: New: jumpswim❀ – Fall Out Of Love (Feat. Ninna Lundberg)
body:
Recorded between Copenhagen and London, **jumpswim❀** and **Ninna Lundberg’s** debut collaboration, _Do For Love_, a reworking of Bobby Caldwell’s classic, quite rightly earned them numerous online plaudits.

Their second offering, almost a year down the line, is another glitchy yet vocally perfect number. Early days for the two of them, but I’d quite happily listen to an album’s worth of collaborations.

Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
